testcase.name: Given User opens Login Page and login to the base page
When add new sportsmen with data:\u002C
Then user finds added sportsmen and checks saved data

failure.message: Data in the first record is not as expected Expected: <[Automation01 Auto01 Automiddle, Kyrovogradska, Dinamo, Junior, FS]> but: was <[Automation01 Auto01 Automiddle, Kirovogradska, Dinamo, 2015, FS]>
